column5: Start date: January 2024    As more people and services look to digital technologies, the risks and threats of cybercrime continue to grow. This has exposed a shortfall in experienced cybercrime investigators. Study our  MSc Cybercrime  and join the next generation of cybercrime researchers and investigators.   Why this MSc Cybercrime?   With an  MSc in Cybercrime  , you'll gain the skills needed to meet theÂ demand for experienced cybercrime investigators and help make the online world a safer place.   On this course, you'll focus on the acts of cybercrime and the criminals behind them.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
